message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs. Given its unique features and the quality it offers, I believe it would greatly benefit your operations. For this exceptional opportunity, I am offering the product at a special introductory price of $9500. This is a limited-time offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement soon.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the introductory price, I'm looking to stay closer to the $10000 mark.  Would you be willing to come down to $10000 for this purchase?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your interest in our product. In light of that, I am willing to consider your offer. However, due to the costs associated with production and maintaining high-quality standards, I cannot accept the full $10000. I am proposing a price of $9750 for the product. I hope this meets your expectations and allows us to move forward with this transaction.
